briefTitle: A Study Comparing Bevacizumab Therapy With or Without Erlotinib for First-Line Treatment of Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (ATLAS)
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Phase IIIb Trial Comparing Bevacizumab Therapy With or Without Erlotinib After Completion of Chemotherapy With Bevacizumab for the First-Line Treatment of Locally Advanced, Recurrent, or Metastatic Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
summary: This is a Phase IIIb, multicenter, randomized, placebo-controlled trial to evaluate the safety and efficacy of chemotherapy+bevacizumab followed by bevacizumab+erlotinib versus bevacizumab+erlotinib placebo in subjects with locally advanced or metastatic NSCLC.
